name: sspace-longread

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
SSPACE-LongRead is a stand-alone program for scaffolding pre-assembled
contigs using long reads Note: A manual download is required for SSPACE-
LongRead. Spack will search your current directory for the download
file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that Spack can find
it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
